author: Inna
text:
UPDATE Re: So I have been patiently waiting for over two weeks to hear back from VC since April 5 when their support representative replied here to my review  saying that they were looking into a solution. As of now, no follow up and no solution. Horrible experience:(

re: Thank you VC for looking into this. 
Ref.17077575 sold on Feb. 11, 2022
I will update the review depending on the outcome of your investigation. Looking forward to hearing back from you.

I sold a vintage leather bag in very good condition that arrived to the NY hub badly damaged by the courier. It arrived all smashed with a huge hole and the stitching popped out because of some heavy weight applied to it. As an expert seller with a record of over 300 items sold, I clearly know to distinguish between an item in a very good condition vs a destroyed bag. My sale got cancelled and the bag was sent back to me. I immediately contacted VC with request to open an investigation/claim with a courier. I was advised that they needed more photos from me to do so. Obviously, it wasn't possible while the bag was being shipped back to me. The transport department failed to mark the parcel as a return, so it took almost a month and about 12 emails to get the bag released from the customs. To my great surprise, after I finally received the bag and sent the requested photos to VC in order to open the investigation/ claim, I got the following response. "Even if I wanted, to open the investigation", wrote the agent, " It wouldn't be possible because there has been a month since the delivery". I think the quote clearly shows that there has been no intent what's so ever to follow up on my claim initially. I lost both my sale and my item which now is ruined and not wearable/unsellable. My mistake was to simply follow the advice of the support team instead of filing the damage claim directly with DHL. I guess the fact that I assumed that VC was actually looking into my complaint was wrong, as seen from the ridiculous response " even if I wanted", which they clearly implied they didn't in the first place. Too bad it took me 20 emails to exchange to finally understand the point. Beyond disappointed with the horrible service!!!
title: Non existing support

author: Luke Reynolds
text:
I recently sold an item on Vestiarie and it was dispatched immediately although took 3 days to be sent to the buyer via the UPS postage set up by the webiste.   Despite a confirmed delivery to the address on the label, I was notified immediately that the buyer had not received the item and that an investigation was being opened and would take a further 20 days.  

As I fulfilled my obligations to the letter, I do not see why one should so long for this to be resolved, meaning I was out of pocket for a further few weeks.   My biggest complaint however cocerns their customer services which is nothing short of disgraceful and shambolic.  The repsonse time to emails is literally days and then a response comes through which does not relate to the question and in essence ,it buys them another 48 hours.  There is absolutely no guidance about my situation, they lied to me on live chat that I was actually being paid and that payment had been processed and when, a week later, I finally get a repsonse, I am told that the matter is still under investigation. 

Despite dozens of enquiries and emails demanding that someone call me, two weeks later and I still have not been called.  Farcical.  As a result, I am suing Vestiaire whom are even making that quite diffcult as they will not respond to any emails about to whom to write in their legal team.  I am £350 out of pocket and fuming!

author: Anna
text: I am a buyer and have made over 15 purchaces in the past 5 years. Was very satissfied from the start but will not buy here again. Several reasons. 1) Customer service is now only available in the chat and although some are good some just leave the chat in the middle of it or promise to come back by email and don’t do it. Whatever error they make they suggest a 10% voucher for next purchace and write a shablon message about how they understand why you are not happy but they will do better. 2) Got an item with defects that passed the quality control. Good that at least that the return was smooth. 3) Got an item that was over 2000€ without original box although buyer wrote it will come with box. Quality control didn’t notice the box was missing. 4) A Chanel bag I purchaced was 2500€ but because I am in Sweden price was shown in SEK in my Vestiaire app and it said 28133SEK! While according to the exchange rate that day it should have been no more than 26000SEK. So where is +2000SEK (approx. 200€) comming from? Sadly I checked what price in EUR it was only after purchasing in SEK. If I had switched to EUR in the app and paid in EUR with automatic exchange in my bank account I would hve saved 200€. Now it went to Vestiaire account I guess because seller only got equivalent to 2500€ minus selling fees of course. Sad, as 3-5 years ago there was a customer care available by phone and the quality control was professional.
title: Not buying here again although start was good

author: Mgmirko
text:
I wrote a review a long time ago where I gave 4 stars to this app but unfortunately in the last 9/10 months Vestiaire has gone down hills. It was all good until their “quality team” has started randomly refusing my items saying they were not genuine, At first I was shocked as I’ve been selling for the last 2 years pretty much the same items as I work in retail and I can get it using staff discount, so I provided them with proof of purchase and they got very rude, one of the customer service guy started threatening me saying I shouldn’t question their quality team and if I carry on he would have blocked my account LOL to get my items back Vestiaire charge you €12.50, what a beautiful scam, they mark your item as not genuine and you gotta pay to have it back. Anyway, I asked to provide me with some evidence that the items were fake and they closed the chat without answering. A friend of mine created an account on Vestiaire and to test their so good authentication team, he decided to sell a fake item, and you know what happened? The item has been checked and accepted by their quality team 😭 I was absolutely shocked by this! ( don’t worry my friend contacted them before the item was shipped to the buyer) at this point my friend was expecting his account to be closed and they didn’t they any action! They have no experience or any type of qualifications to do this job! BE CAREFUL GUYS ON BUYING ON THIS APP! PLEASE GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!!
And this is not the only problem I’ve been having, when uploading photos their other quality check team 🤣 another joke and absolutely useless people, they make impossible to upload an item even if this item was already sold previously!!! I spent hours and hours because they don’t have an option to resell the item like eBay so you are forced to spend so much time in taking pictures for then not being approved!!! The same pictures they approved just a week before !!! And even if you take new pictures they are still asking you for more pictures and then it gets declined anyway!! When I contacted customer service guess what? The person laughed at me saying it’s not their fault if the pictures are not good ! WHAT KIND OF CUSTOMER SERVICE IS THIS!!!???
Man this is a proper scam company!
Can’t believe this is actually legal!
title: They can’t tell the difference between a fake from an original

author: Fatima
text:
I have been in touch with this company for several weeks now. They have been holding a substantial amount of my money for a purchase that I have yet to receive.

They offered me a partial refund since they sent me the wrong product and it somehow passed their ‘authentication and verification checks’ that we pay for. The product did not match the description. I returned the product very quickly and STILL have heard nothing regarding mine. All I know is that it is at the warehouse. 

They are now trying to not provide me the cash refund and are offering app credit - why would I choose to use the app again after this distressing experience? 

I’m starting to think Vestiaire and the colleagues I have spoken to so far (Oury, Laura, Fanni, Max) are all part of a scam. 

I will be contacting my credit card provider regarding obtaining a refund. I will keep Trustpilot updated with my experience.
title: Must be a scam company

author: Mia Osborne
text:
I have been a member both buyer and seller for over 10 years… what an experience to ruin it all.
I purchased a dress for £550 which was cancelled about an hour after so I chatted to the seller asking what the problem was. She assured me she didn’t cancel the sale.
I spoke on the chat to customer service they said it was a glitch and to ask the seller to relist.
They sent this issue to the expert team.
So the seller relisted and I repurchased. An hour later the same thing happened. I spoke to seller again and she said there was some sort of misunderstanding it was her first time etc. The customer service chat told me the seller had asked them to cancel the sale as she had sold it elsewhere. I was shocked the seller had been lying to me and asked her is she spoke other languages incase her English wasn’t good - I also suggested she list elsewhere if the al was hard to use. Next thing I know I am blocked from buyer seller chat. I report the seller as I purchased the dress a third time (so at this stage I have spent £1700) and she cancelled the sale again. I talked to 4 different customer service people retained all the transcripts and was told the buy/seller ban will be lifted and they are sorry, this seller behaviour isn’t acceptable etc. the expert team show me how to check when a refund is issued … condescending to say the least as I have used the app and website for a long time. This morning I get an email that I am banned forever from chat. Talk about a final slap to the face. The seller has 0 restrictions and is brand new yet a seasoned premium customer is treated like dirt .


Listing 1 Item numbers : 22213044 
Listing 2 Item number : 22232967
Listing 3 Item number : 22236755

Seller profile : members/profile-16223190.shtm


Gets even better - I get an email today from customer care telling me the first time the seller cancelled the second two was payment error however All the money left my account. Successfully and I was emailed earlier to expect refunds…. Wow it’s a bunch of imbeciles working there - all on the same email response.

And to add to the response below your customer service ‘expert’ team is as useless and unhelpful as your auto generated comment below. I have one spoken to one person in the last week who answered my actual question. That’s disgusting based on the number of customers uou have. I’d will not be using your site anymore and will de list my items. You don’t deserve anyones money for the poor poor poor poor customer service you offer.
title: Waste of time and energy - worst customer service ever.
